directions.step:
In medium bowl, combine yogurt, apple sauce, honey and cinnamon; blend well. Fill each cup with about 1/3 cup yogurt mixture.
Place cups in freezer until partially frozen, about 1 hour.
Insert sticks; freeze until firm, about 2 hours. To serve, remove drink cups.
Notes: Pantry: Mott's Natural or Cinnamon Apple Sauce. Either plastic popsicle molds or ice cube trays can be used to make these refreshing cinnamon-flavored yogurt pops.
